mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_password, user_name, zipcode, address, address_detail, access_level, created_by) values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{accessLevel}, #{createdBy})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_name, access_level, access_time, login_try_count, login_lock, activate_flag, created_by, created_at, updated_at, delete_flag from user where user_id = #{userId}
